channel.title: "Teleport Talk"
channel.description:
i want to make a code like this but i dont know how:
Hans: Hello "+playerName+" do you want to teleport somwere? player: Yes or No Hans: if yes: Where? Hans: if no the talk stop player: Varrock Hans: ok here we go!
[u]Remember this was just a example[/u]
And we get teleported to Varrock, please help me
-Meele

item.title: "Teleport Talk"
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

i want to make a code like this but i dont know how:

Hans: Hello “+playerName+” do you want to teleport somwere?
player: Yes or No
Hans: if yes: Where?
Hans: if no the talk stop
player: Varrock
Hans: ok here we go!

Remember this was just a example

And we get teleported to Varrock, please help me

-Meele
